column1: ICYMI: I joined @stinchfield1776 on @newsmax last night to discuss the Georgia recount and the importance of the Senate runoff election. If Democrats take control court packing defunding the police and closing our economy are on their radical agenda. https://t.co/CIepBxVlwR
